General.Name: Jiangsu Shemar Electric Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Shemar Electric Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of composite outer insulation for power system substations, transmission and distribution lines, and rubber seals in China. The company offers substation composite insulators, including hollow composite insulators and pillar composite insulators; transformer composite bushings; switch composite bushings; and line composite insulators and composite crossarms, such as transmission tower composite cross arms and distribution network composite cross arms. It also provides sealing solutions for electrical equipment; anti-flashover solutions; long-life line composite insulators; gas insulated composite bushings; explosion-proof transformer composite bushings; and glass outer insulation products. In addition, the company engages in the development of power equipment and mold related technology; and sale of rubber seals, line insulators and bushing power transmission, transformation equipment, and their parts. Jiangsu Shemar Electric Co.,Ltd was founded in 1996 and is based in Nantong, China. Jiangsu Shemar Electric Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of Shanghai Shenma Electric Power Holdings Co., Ltd.
